title: cant push data to ria-sibling
body:
I have created a ria sibling (called backup) on an external disk following the guide from the handbook (http://handbook.datalad.org/en/latest/beyond_basics/101-147-riastores.html)

pushing to the sibling whilst not transferring any data seems to work fine:
 ` datalad push --to backup --data nothing`

however when I omit the `--data` flag I always get the error message:

`Push to 'backup':  25%|██████████████████████████▊                                                                                | 1.00/4.00 [00:00<00:00, 7.15k Steps/sCommandError: 'git -c diff.ignoreSubmodules=none annex copy --batch -z --to backup-storage --fast --json --json-error-messages --json-progress -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3' failed with exitcode 1`

I am using Ubuntu 20.04 and Datalad 0.14.4 (installed via conda)
I did some research but couldn't find a solution for my problem, I'm hoping you can help me out (this is my first datalad project)
